actor_awards.notes: Gained fame starring in the hit TV series 'Sea Hunt' (1958-1961) before his late-career comedy resurgence.

filmography.title: Sahara
filmography.role_description: A British soldier in a multicultural Allied unit fighting Nazis in the Libyan desert.
filmography.plot: After the fall of Tobruk, a sergeant and his tank crew pick up a group of stragglers and try to defend a well against a German battalion.

filmography.title: A Walk in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A reliable sergeant leading his squad through the Italian countryside during the invasion of Salerno.
filmography.plot: A platoon of American soldiers tramps through the Italian countryside on a mission to take a farmhouse from the Nazis.

filmography.title: Canyon Passage
filmography.role_description: A menacing, violent outlaw who threatens the peace of a frontier community in Oregon.
filmography.plot: A mule freight owner in 1856 Oregon balances business, romance, and Native American uprisings.

filmography.title: Ramrod
filmography.role_description: A ruthless ranch hand involved in a violent range war over grazing rights.
filmography.plot: A woman inherits a ranch and hires a recovering alcoholic as her foreman to fight a powerful cattle baron.

filmography.title: Moonrise
filmography.role_description: A childhood friend of the protagonist who becomes a romantic rival in this atmospheric noir.
filmography.plot: A man accidentally kills his tormentor in a fight and tries to hide the crime while falling in love with the victim's girlfriend.

filmography.title: Home of the Brave
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic soldier who tries to protect his black comrade from the racism of their platoon.
filmography.plot: A black soldier faces prejudice from his fellow troops while on a dangerous mission on a Japanese-held island.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Trapped
filmography.role_description: A cool, calculating counterfeiter who breaks out of prison to recover his hidden plates.
filmography.plot: A counterfeiter agrees to work with the Treasury Department to catch a ring of forgers but has his own agenda.

filmography.title: Rocketship X-M
filmography.role_description: The pilot of the first manned expedition to the Moon, which accidentally lands on Mars.
filmography.plot: A spaceship expedition to the Moon is blown off course and lands on Mars, where the crew discovers the ruins of a lost civilization.

filmography.title: The Sound of Fury
filmography.role_description: A sociopathic drifter who manipulates a desperate family man into a life of violent crime.
filmography.plot: A struggling ex-GI gets involved with a charismatic criminal, leading to a kidnapping and a media frenzy.
filmography.awards: BAFTA: Nomination – Best Film (under title 'The Sound of Fury')

filmography.title: The White Tower
filmography.role_description: A proud, former Nazi mountaineer who competes with an American to scale a treacherous peak.
filmography.plot: Six people attempt to climb a dangerous mountain in the Swiss Alps, each for their own personal reasons.

filmography.title: High Noon
filmography.role_description: A resentful, ambitious deputy who abandons his marshal when he is passed over for promotion.
filmography.plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon.

filmography.title: Plymouth Adventure
filmography.role_description: The rebellious first mate of the Mayflower who clashes with the Captain.
filmography.plot: The story of the voyage of the Mayflower and the hardships faced by the Pilgrims.

filmography.title: The Tall Texan
filmography.role_description: A rugged traveler who becomes part of a group seeking gold in Native American territory.
filmography.plot: Five travelers and a convict team up to search for gold on sacred Indian land.

filmography.title: Wichita
filmography.role_description: The brother of Wyatt Earp who helps him bring law and order to a cowtown.
filmography.plot: Wyatt Earp agrees to become the marshal of lawless Wichita, Kansas, but his strict enforcement of the law angers the town leaders.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Outdoor Drama

filmography.title: The Rainmaker
filmography.role_description: The skeptical and pragmatic brother of a spinster who clashes with a charismatic con man.
filmography.plot: A con man arrives in a drought-ridden town, bringing hope and romance to a spinster.

filmography.title: The Goddess
filmography.role_description: A washed-up boxer who marries a lonely movie star, both struggling with their fading glories.
filmography.plot: A girl from the slums becomes a movie star but finds that fame and fortune do not bring happiness.

filmography.title: Around the World Under the Sea
filmography.role_description: A scientist aboard a sophisticated submarine on a mission to install earthquake warning sensors.
filmography.plot: A crew of scientists travels the globe in a submarine to plant sensors on the ocean floor to warn of impending earthquakes.

filmography.title: The Happy Ending
filmography.role_description: A charming older man who encounters a disillusioned housewife during her journey of self-discovery.
filmography.plot: A bored housewife runs away from her husband to find herself, reflecting on her life and choices.

filmography.title: High Anxiety
filmography.role_description: A corrupt and shady psychiatrist at the Institute for the Very, Very Nervous.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist with severe acrophobia goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Motion Picture (Comedy/Musical)

filmography.title: Airplane!
filmography.role_description: A frantic air traffic control supervisor who famously picks the wrong week to quit drinking, smoking, and sniffing glue.
filmography.plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

filmography.title: Airplane II: The Sequel
filmography.role_description: Returning as the frazzled controller, now handling a space shuttle crisis.
filmography.plot: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun.

filmography.title: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
filmography.role_description: A corrupt politician who works with the Big Three automakers to crush Preston Tucker's car company.
filmography.plot: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

filmography.title: Cousins
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, curmudgeonly uncle whose remarriage brings the two protagonists together.
filmography.plot: Two cousins by marriage fall in love after their respective spouses have an affair.

filmography.title: Joe Versus the Volcano
filmography.role_description: An eccentric industrialist who hires the protagonist to jump into a volcano to solve a mineral rights problem.
filmography.plot: A hypochondriac learns he is dying and accepts an offer to throw himself into a volcano on a tropical island.

filmography.title: Hot Shots!
filmography.role_description: A senile, accident-prone Admiral with a body full of surgical replacements who commands the mission.
filmography.plot: A parody of Top Gun in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission.

filmography.title: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
filmography.role_description: The owner of the laboratory where Wayne Szalinski accidentally enlarges his toddler son.
filmography.plot: The Szalinski family is back, this time with a toddler who accidentally grows to giant size.

filmography.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
filmography.role_description: Now the President of the United States, Benson is even more oblivious and physically resilient than before.
filmography.plot: Topper Harley leaves a Buddhist monastery to lead a rescue mission into Iraq to save the men who went to save the men.

filmography.title: Blown Away
filmography.role_description: The uncle and mentor to a bomb squad officer, who becomes a target of a mad bomber.
filmography.plot: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

filmography.title: Jane Austen's Mafia!
filmography.role_description: The aging, clumsy don of a crime family; Bridges' final film role.
filmography.plot: A parody of the Godfather series and other crime movies.
